member.name: GLYPHMETRICSFLOAT
member.summary: The GLYPHMETRICSFLOAT structure contains information about the placement and orientation of a glyph in a character cell.

member.name: GLYPHMETRICSFLOAT.gmfBlackBoxX
member.summary: Specifies the width of the smallest rectangle (the glyph's black box) that completely encloses the glyph.

member.name: GLYPHMETRICSFLOAT.gmfBlackBoxY
member.summary: Specifies the height of the smallest rectangle (the glyph's black box) that completely encloses the glyph.

member.name: GLYPHMETRICSFLOAT.gmfptGlyphOrigin
member.summary: Specifies the x and y coordinates of the upper-left corner of the smallest rectangle that completely encloses the glyph.

member.name: GLYPHMETRICSFLOAT.gmfCellIncX
member.summary: Specifies the horizontal distance from the origin of the current character cell to the origin of the next character cell.

member.name: GLYPHMETRICSFLOAT.gmfCellIncY
member.summary: Specifies the vertical distance from the origin of the current character cell to the origin of the next character cell.
